name: trackmint-monorepo
description: TrackMint Personal Finance Dashboard - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev-all: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy-frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'Frontend built successfully! Deploy the frontend/dist folder to your hosting platform.'
